inn1.comm: off the pad the ball goes to the onside.
left alone outside the off stump, the ball does not carry to the keeper.
good length delivery angled across, moves away off the seam, left alone.
first runs of the match, turns it off his pads in front of square leg to the deep for couple of runs.
back of a length delivery angled across, watches it closely and lets it go through to  Dhiman Ghosh.
good tight line, Butt pushes with the full face off the bat down the track to mid-on.
hint of away swing, on a good length and Akmal defends to the off side with an angled bat.
back of a length delivery and moving away slightly, defended once again with an angled bat to point.
opens the face of the bat and runs it down to thirdman to get off the mark.
digs in a good short delivery, Butt gets under the ball.
good length delivery defended to the off side.
good ball comes in as Butt is cramped for room, gets an inside edge to the onside.
down the leg side.
stands tall and punches wide of mid-off for a single.
slower delivery wide outside the off stump, cuts and misses.
loud appeal for lbw turned down, a very good delivery that jagged back in to strike the pad, that was a close thing, a good shout, not given.
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump in the corridor, left alone.
moves forward and pushes with an angled bat to backward point.
pushes on the front foot to mid-on.
extra effort as he delivers the ball, driven to mid-off on the front foot.
good tight line back of a length, pushes it back to the bowler, who shows some aggression by looking to throw back.
pushes on the front foot to mid-off, not a well timed shot.
short ball pulled well in the air to deep-midwicket, Shakib Al Hassan runs around to field the ball and restricts to two.
good tight line and Butt plays it down to thirdman for a single.
a bouncer to end the over.
turned away to the onside.
good looking shot, tucks it off his legs through midwicket, the ball races along the turf to the fence.
takes the inside half of the bat and goes to the onside as he defends.
good length delivery defended to the onside, Mortaza moves across to field the ball.
turned away behind square leg for a single.
outside edge down to thirdman as Akmal looking to drive in front of the wicket.
pushes to mid-on.
back of a length delivery coming in, off the pad to the onside as Akmal looks to work it through the onside.
short delivery turned away behind square leg for a single.
a bouncer and Butt ducks under it.
another short delivery, an attempted bouncer which does not rise, Butt gets under it.
looking to work it through the onside, misses it, off the pad the ball goes to the onside.
slashes at a short and wide delivery outside the off stump, down to thirdman for a single.
moves forward and defends to short cover.
slower delivery turned to square leg, shy at the stumps at the non-strikers end as Akmal takes off.
moves forward and pushes to mid-off.
punches on the front foot to mid-off.
slower delivery defended to the off side, cannot put it away as there is no pace on the ball.
short delivery and Akmal pulls in the air in front of square leg to the deep, a mistimed shot.
back of a length delivery, stands up and punches to mid-on.
turns it away to square leg for a single.
good shot this time from Akmal, Shahadat drops it short and Akmal hooks well to fine leg fence.
another short delivery and Akmal gets it right once again, pulls well in the air to fine leg fence.
three in three for Akmal, short and wide outside the off stump, cuts well in the air behind point to the fence.
short delivery, Butt moves across slightly and pulls it around along the ground behind square leg to the fence as the fielder chases in vain.
pushes off the back foot to mid-on.
cut away hard but straight to the fielder at backward point.
slower delivery driven to the off side, Ashraful at short cover does well.
pushes in the gap past the fielders at short cover for a single.
good shot from Akmal, works it away nicely behind square leg to the deep for couple of runs.
Butt looking to cut gets an under edge past the diving keeper to the fence.

this time cuts in front of the wicket to deep-extra cover, Butt says no to Akmal for the second run but Akmal keeps on running and both the batsmen are almost at the same end, the throw was a wild and wide, the keeper had to go a long way to collect the ball but then he also had a chance to throw at the stumps, misses it as Akmal gets back in. A good run out chance missed.
pushes to the off side.
driven to mid-off.
turned away neatly off his legs behind square leg to the fence, well played Akmal.
lovely shot from Akmal, a copy book cover drive, puts his left foot forward and drives well through the line past the diving cover to the fence. That is 50 for Pakistan.
defended on the front foot.
moves forward and works it wide of mid-on for a single.
punches off the back foot to extra cover.
moves forward and drives to mid-off.
drags it a bit short and Akmal quickly picks up the length and cuts to deep-point.
pushes to mid-off and takes off for a tight single and completes it.
wide outside the off stump, cut away hard to cover.
punches off the back foot to cover.
good shot from Akmal, chips it over the fielder at mid-off to the deep, picked up the slower delivery. Shahadat Hossain does well to chase it and pull it in.
makes room and cuts through cover to the sweeper for a single.
poor fielding at mid-off by Shahadat Hossain. Full toss driven well to mid-off and the misfield goes to the fence.
unfortunate for Reza and Bangladesh as Akmal goes for the pull and gets an inside edge down to fine leg fence.
plays wide of mid-on for a single.
cuts in the air, on the bounce to backward point.
short delivery and Akmal cuts to deep-backward point.
plays bit wide of Mortaza, who does well to pick up and score a direct hit but the batsman is in.
Akmal goes in the air, lofts it high and over mid-off to the fence.
moves forward and plays square of the wicket on the off side.
half-volley driven to extra cover along the ground.
goes in the air over cover to the deep for a single.
plays it down to thirdman for a single.
slower delivery looking to force it through, cannot get his timing right, the ball goes square of the wicket on the off side and they scamper through for a single.
good ball, punches off the back foot to mid-off.
steers it down to thirdman with an angled bat down to thirdman for a single.
moves back and pushes to mid-on.
pushes to the off side on the front foot.
makes room and cuts hard along the ground to deep-point, a fumble allows the second run and that brings up the 50 for Akmal.
cut hard once again but this time straight to the fielder at backward point.
played to the sweeper cover for a single.
short and wide outside the off stump, Butt needs no invitation, cuts hard to the point boundary, good shot.
good postive strike from Akmal, short of a length delivery and Akmal few steps down the track and pulls well over the midwicket fielder to the fence.
short delivery and Akmal plays a pull shot over midwicket to the fence, this is wonderful striking from Akmal.
pitches it up full and Akmal drives but cannot find the gap at cover.
full toss driven square of the wicket to deep-point for a single.
driven well down the ground to long off.
yorker length delivery outside the off stump, Akmal drives and misses.
pushes to the off side.
plays it back to the bowler and Akmal dives back into the crease.
sweeps well this time, plays in front of square leg to the fence.
wide outside the off stump and Butt cuts hard behind point to the fence.
moves across in line and works it square of the wicket on the onside to the deep.
moves forward and looks to defend, off the pad to the off side.
fuller delivery driven down the ground to long off.
in the slot for Akmal, drives to extra cover but cannot find the gap.
yorker length delivery outside the off stump, plays and misses.
good shot in the gap, a full toss and Akmal drives well to the left of backward point to the fence.
full delivery outside the off stump, squeezed out to deep-cover point.
moves forward and drives back to the bowler.
driven back down the track to the bowler.
moves forward and plays square of the wicket on the off side.
places it well, moves forward and drives square of the wicket on the off side to the deep.
down the wicket and hits it well high in the air and over the bowler, got a good contact on the ball, goes all the way over long off fence.
driven hard past the bowler to long off.
driven back to the bowler.
squeezes it in the air past backward point to the fence.
low full toss driven to mid-on.
cuts and misses outside the off stump, the keeper gets a bad bounce.
good shot but for no runs as it was hit along the ground straight to the fielder at extra cover.
whipped away nicely to the right of midwicket fielder to the fence.
full toss wide outside the off stump and Akmal drives square of the wicket on the off side to the deep, the fielder gets around but cannot stop it, goes to the fence.
pushes square of the wicket on the off side for a single.
moves forward and eases the ball to mid-off.
plays to cover and takes off for a run, the fielder is in quickly, Akmal gets back in time.
moves forward and pushes to the off side, the extra cover cuts it off.
looks to drive in the front of the wicket on the off side, gets the outside edge down to thirdman fence as the fielder chases in vain.
moves forward and drives well down the ground to long off.
good ball, stops on Akmal, pushes back down the track.
driven down the ground to long on.
turns it around wide of mid-on for a single, the fielder strikes the stumps, cheers from the crowd.
pushes to the off side.
good shot, cuts well behind point to the deep, Nafees running around puts his foot  to field the ball but cannot do so and he kicks the ground in frustration.
pushes to mid-on for a single.
moves forward and drives down the ground to long off, moves onto 98.
pushes to the right of cover for a single.
plays square of the wicket on the off side, Butt takes off from the non-strikers end.
pushes down the ground to long off, moves onto 99.
cuts to deep-point for a single.
pushes to extra cover, cannot get the single.
pushes to extra cover.
moves forward and plays wide of long on for a single, that brings Akmal on strike.
there you go, Akmal drives through the off side to the deep to bring up his fourth 100, raises his bat to the crowd as they cheer on.
works to the onside for a single, brings up the 50 for Butt.
Akmal goes after a good century, was looking to cut the ball which was too close to him, misses it and the ball knocks the top of the off stump.
driven down the ground to long off to get off the mark.
defended on the front foot to the off side.
pushes to mid-on.
defends it back to the bowler.
moves forward and defends to the off side.
moves forward and works to the onside to midwicket.
cuts to deep-point for a single.
pushes back to the bowler.
punches it down the ground to long on.
pushes on the front foot back to the bowler.
good shot from Butt, hits in the air over extra cover to the fence, lot of room for Butt to go with the shot.
short ball and Butt pulls well down the ground to long on.
works to the fielder at midwicket.
swings it high and over midwicket to the fence.
cut to deep-point for a single.

run out! Moves forward and pushes to mid-on and takes off for a single, Butt was not coming, Bazid keeps on running, Mortaza picks up the ball and throws it bit wide to Dhiman Ghosh, who has lot of time to get rid of the stumps. A needless run out.
moves back and works to the onside.
misses the sweep, the ball strikes the pad and loud appeal, after a long wait Bucknor turns it down. The ball strikes the pad outside the off stump.
works it to the onside.
too wide outside the off stump.
turns it around once again straight to the fielder on the onside.
driven nicely through extra cover to the deep, good running gets them three runs.
short delivery that surprises Yousuf, who manages to get some glove to it and the ball goes to the onside.
a bouncer and Yousuf gets out the way and through to Dhiman Ghosh.
driven to mid-on.
driven down the ground to wide long on.
turns it around square of the wicket on the onside.
cuts and misses, a good delivery from Shakib Al Hassan.
looking to work it through the onside, misses it, off the pad the ball falls on the track.
stumped! Comes down the track and looks to play through the onside, misses it completely and Dhiman Ghosh collects the ball and whips off the bails.
straight away plays the big sweep shot in the air to deep-square leg.
short ball pulled around to deep-midwicket, Tamim Iqbal runs around to field it.
good sharp bouncer from Shahadat Hossain, Afridi was thinking of a hook shot, pulls out of it. Good aggression from the bowler.
does not get his short delivery right, pulls in the air to long leg, one, two bounce to the fence.
appeal for a lbw turned down as there was an inside edge.
short ball and Afridi pulls and gets a top-edge, the ball flies over the keeper to the fence.
flicks it in the air behind square leg to the deep.
walks across his stumps and pushes down the ground to long on.
driven down the ground to long on.
caught! Down the track and Afridi holds out to Mortaza at long on, who takes the catch but in the process he seems to injured himself as he landed on his hands, that must have hurt his shoulder.
moves forward and defends to the off side.
moves back and punches it back to the bowler.
a slight hesitation as Malik nudges it to short fine leg, they complete the single in the end.
tucks it square of the wicket on the onside for a single.
bit of width outside the off stump, cut straight to the fielder at backward point.
pushes to mid-off.
plays with an angled bat to backward point.
driven down the ground with the full face off the bat to long off for an easy single.
tucked away to fine leg for a single.
moves forward and pushes to extra cover.
punches to the onside.
cuts it late to short thirdman.
pushes to the right of cover for a single.
turns it around to deep-midwicket for a single.
works to the onside to short midwicket.
punches it back to the bowler.
worked to the onside.
defended to the off side.
pushes to the onside, midwicket runs across to cut it.
punches down the ground to long on.
works it square of the wicket on the onside to the deep, sloppy fielding by Nafees, too late onto the ball.
outside the off stump and Malik cuts it down to thirdman for a single.
punches to mid-off.
short ball from Mortaza and Butt picks up empty spaces on the onside, pulls well in the air to the midwicket fence, brings up the 200 for Pakistan.
punches off the back foot to the sweeper cover.
good slower one from Mortaza, Butt can only defend it.
slower delivery once again, plays to backward point.
driven down the ground to long on.
comes forward and defends to extra cover.
drags it a touch short, makes room and cuts through cover, good running, comes back for the second run.
sweeps and misses, Butt loses sight of the ball as it goes past the keeper to short fine leg.
driven down the ground to long off.
driven down the ground past the bowler who looks to field it but cannot do so, goes to long on for a single.
good ball back of a length, inside edges onto the thigh pad and the ball goes to behind the wicket on the off side.
cuts off the stumps to thirdman, a slight fumble by Aftab, Butt wants the second run, he takes off but Malik sends him back.
punches it off his back foot through the onside past the short midwicket to the deep.
good slower delivery, pushes bit uppishly past the bowler to mid-on.
fuller length delivery driven down the ground to wide long off, coming back for the second run.
another slower delivery, punched on the front foot to extra cover.
driven down the ground to long on.
works it in front of square leg to the deep.
driven down the ground to long on for a single.
pushes to cover and takes off for a sharp single.
down the track and plays the full toss straight to the fielder at midwicket, does not put it away.
mistimes the drive down the ground to long off.
punches off the back foot to wide mid-on, the midwicket fielder does well running across.
good tight delivery from Mortaza, defends with a straight bat to the onside.
on the legs, turns it to deep-square leg for couple of runs.
cannot get it through the fielder at extra cover as Malik punches hard.
drops it on the track and looks for a single but the keeper was onto it to prevent the single.
driven straight to the fielder at extra cover.
poor fielding in the deep, makes room and cuts hard behind point, the fielder runs around and gets to the ball but does not field it cleanly, goes to the fence.
sweeps and gets the back of the bat, the ball goes to short thirdman.
good use of the feet and drives down the ground to wide long on.
fires it down the leg side.
driven down the ground with the full face off the bat to long off.
punches hard to extra cover.
down the leg side and Butt sweeps well to long leg fence, Nafees fails to get to the ball as he runs around to field it.
moves forward and drives through the off side to deep-extra cover, good running, comes back for the second run.
drives along the ground straight to the fielder at extra cover.
moves back and punches through midwicket.
pushes to extra cover on the front foot.
moves back and punches through cover to the sweeper for couple of runs, moves onto 97.
pushes once again through cover for a single, 98 now.
stands in the crease and punches down the ground to long on. Butt on 99.
good quicker delivery and Malik can only block it.
down the wicket and works it through the vacant midwicket to the deep.
there you go, Butt gets to his fifth 100, works it square of the wicket on the onside, raises his bat to the crowd, well played.
moves back and punches to the off side.
comes down the track and works it through midwicket for a single.
moves forward and drives to long off, a casual fielding by Mahmudullah, terrible work.
driven down the ground to long on.
clears his left leg slightly and swings it high in the air to midwicket fence.
opens the face of the bat and plays behind point for a single.
driven down the ground to long on.
turns it around behind square leg to the deep for a single.
wide outside the off stump, cuts and misses.
short ball and Butt bisects the field in the deep to square leg fence, good shot.
again wide outside the off stump, cut to deep-point for a single.
sweeps and misses down the leg side, signaled a wide, a terrible delivery.
down the wicket and driven firmly down the ground to long off.
pushes down the ground to long on for a single.
down the wicket and goes inside-out along the ground, excellent fielding by Ashraful at extra cover.
fuller delivery, moves across his stumps and drives down the ground to long on.
makes room and hits over cover to the deep.
lbw! Goes for a big swing on the onside, misses it completely and the ball strikes the pad, loud appeal and Bucknor raises his finger.
drives it down the ground to long off to get off the mark.
fuller delivery outside the off stump, Butt goes inside-out and hits it along the ground to extra cover fence, nobody moves, wonderful shot.
driven to cover, we have few overthrows.
a beamer from Hossain, signaled a noball, gets a warning too.
fuller delivery driven down the ground to long off.
mistimes the pull shot to the onside.
slower delivery driven down the ground to long on.
short delivery cut to gully.
short delivery, mistimes the pull shot, drops short of the fielder at midwicket.
fuller delivery driven to cover.
cuts it down to thirdman for a single.
low full toss and and Butt gets an edge down to thirdman for couple of runs.
on the leg stump, worked to midwicket.
pushes to the off side for a single.
driven down the ground to long off.
good shot, plays wide of mid-off to the fence, goes past his highest score.
fuller delivery dug out down the ground to long on.
moves back to the delivery and looks to play, misses it, strikes the thigh pad.
mistimes the cut to the off side.
mistimes the pull shot to the onside.
good shot, Misbah goes up and over mid-off to the fence.
caught! Misbah-ul-Haq goes for a pull shot and mishits it high in the air to mid-on, Razzak judges it well, settles under it and takes the catch.
low full toss driven down the ground to long on for a single.
plays and misses outside the off stump.
caught! Fuller delivery outside the off stump and Butt goes for a big booming drive and gets the outside edge to Dhiman Ghosh behind the wicket.
good ball on target, defended back to the bowler.
pushes down the ground to long on.
bowled! Second wicket in the over, Sohail Tanvir misses a full delivery and gets bowled.
off the pad the ball goes behind the wicket.
again off the pad, goes to gully, they scamper through for a leg bye.
loud appeal for a caught behind turned down as Fawad Alam misses a pull shot.
full and wide outside the off stump.
pushes to cover for a single.
on the legs, Iftikhar Anjum flicks it in the air down to fine leg fence.
slices it down to thirdman for a single.

inn2.comm: down the leg side, signaled a wide.
another one too wide down the leg side.
fuller delivery on the off stump, driven to cover.
good ball jags back in to hit the pad.
good length delivery defended to the off side.
on the legs and Tamim does the rest, flicks it in the air to fine leg fence.
works to fine leg for a single.
looks to defend on the front foot, off the pad the ball goes to the off side.
off the pads to the keeper.
cuts and misses outside the off stump as the ball moves away.
cuts and misses once again outside the off stump.
another play and a miss, goes for a drive this time and gets beaten.
good length delivery defended to cover.
pushes in the gap through cover for a single.
good length delivery, left alone outside the off stump.
defended to the off side.
drives and misses outside the off stump as the ball moves away.
outside edge down to thirdman as Tamim cuts.
fuller length delivery outside the off stump, left alone.
once again left alone outside the off stump.
pushed to cover.
goes for a big booming drive through the off side and gets an outside edge down to thirdman fence.
good ball nips back in, Tamim plays and misses.
back of a length delivery defended to the onside.
good length delivery on the off stump, pushed to covers.
pushes in the gap through the off side for a single.
good length delivery defended to the off side.
drops it to the off side and takes off for a quick single.
back of a length delivery, gets behind it and defends with a straight bat back to the bowler.
down the leg side.
yorker length delivery dug out to the off side.
another wide down the leg side.
good ball on target, defended back to the bowler.
driven to mid-off.
good length delivery outside the off stump, left alone.
once again left alone outside the off stump.
back of a length delivery defended to the off side, wants a single, sent back by Nafees.
ducks under the bouncer.
slower delivery on the leg stump, works it away to deep-square leg for couple of runs.
nice shot down the ground, drives well through mid-on to the fence.
driven to cover on the front foot.
caught! Short delivery from Tanvir and Nafees goes for the pull shot and gets a top-edge to short midwicket, an easy catch for Butt.
off the pads to the onside.
good length delivery defended to cover.
pushed to cover.
defended to the onside.
good ball back of a length, cramps him for room, plays it back to the bowler.
left alone outside the off stump.
defended to the off side.
plays square of the wicket on the onside for a single.
works it to the onside to midwicket.
digs in a short delivery, Tamim sways away from it.
drives it through extra cover for couple of runs.
pushes it back down the track.
pulls and a gets it just over Yousuf at mid-on, a mistimed shot.
lovely shot from Tamim, put his right foot forward and drives well through cover for a boundary.
drives and gets an outside edge, drops short of Misbah-ul-Haq at first slip.
bouncer, ducks under it.
mistimes the drive to mid-off.
bowled! He cannot be out as it is free hit. Trying to play through the onside, misses it and gets bowled. They go through for a bye.
cuts and misses outside the off stump, a bad bounce for Akmal, who fails to gather it, goes to the fence for byes.
opens the face off the bat and plays to thirdman for a single.
cuts it down to thirdman for couple of runs.
drives and gets an outside edge down to thirdman.
works it through the onside for couple of runs.
good shot, drives it down the ground through mid-off to the fence.
off the pad to fine leg.
another good shot, punches it off the back foot through extra cover and the ball races to the fence.
whips it away through midwicket to the deep.
good length delivery defended back to the bowler.
oversteps, plays it back to the bowler.
good slower delivery, Aftab cuts and misses.
defended to the off side.
slower delivery defended to the off side.
pushes to the off side for a quick single, shy at the stumps misses, overthrows.
good length delivery on target, defended back to the bowler.
defended to the off side.
worked to the onside.
good shot, full delivery outside the off stump, driven nicely through extra cover to the fence.
Two in two, good shot, driven once again through extra cover to the fence.
played down to thirdman for a single.
pushed to cover.
pushes to mid-on.
slower delivery worked to fine leg.
played down to thirdman for a single.
drives it well on the up through mid-off to the fence.
good length delivery on target, defended back to the bowler.
well played, flicks it over the short fine leg to the fence.
back of a length delivery defended to gully.
good ball in the block-hole, dug out back to the bowler.
works it wide of the fielder at fine leg for couple of runs.
pushes to the off side.
cuts it wide of thirdman to the fence.
good length delivery on target, defended.
cuts it down to thirdman.
plays with an angled bat to the off side.
tosses it up outside the off stump, Tamim drives it well in the gap behind point to the fence.
driven to mid-off, a slight fumble by Malik.
works it to short fine leg for a single.
good shot from Aftab, plays a reverse sweep past the short thirdman to the fence.
comes forward and defends back to the bowler.
quicker delivery, off the pad to the onside.
good slower delivery, gets the outside edge and it falls short of Akmal.
played down to thirdman for a single.
left alone outside the off stump.
low full toss down the leg side.
driven to cover.
charges down the track and goes for a drive and gets beaten.
works to fine leg for a single.
turned to square leg.
plays it back to the bowler.
steers it to short thirdman.
works to the onside for a single.
cuts to gully.
swept to long leg for a single.
down the wicket and cuts through cover for couple of runs.
full delivery dug out to mid-on.
tossed up delivery pushed to cover.
run out! Back of a length delivery cut to backward point, excellent stop by Fawad Alam, who picks up the ball and throws it to Akmal, who gets rid of the stumps to run out Tamim.
defended to the off side.
pushes to cover for a quick single.
works it away to long leg for a single.
driven to the sweeper cover for a single.
driven to cover.
moves forward and defends to the off side.
worked to the onside.
plays with an angled bat to gully.
swept to fine leg for couple of runs.
pushed to cover.
pushes to the off side for a quick single.
driven to the sweeper cover for a single.
driven down the ground with the full face off the bat to long off.
work through midwicket, a misfield by Misbah allows the second run.
defended.
cuts to the sweeper cover for a single.
sweeps and misses.
caught! tosses it up and Aftab looks to reverse sweep, gets the back of the bat and the ball lobs up for Akmal to take an easy catch.
swept to long leg for a single.
goes back and punches it in the gap through cover to the sweeper.
pushes in the gap to the off side.
goes for the sweep and gets a top-edge.
driven down the ground to long off.
pushes to cover.
driven to cover.
worked to the onside.
defended.
turns it to midwicket.
comes forward and defends.
down on one knee and hits it high in the air down to the midwicket fence.
worked to midwicket for a single.
moves forward and drives wide of long off for couple of runs.
plays to short thirdman for a single.
tossed up delivery driven to cover.
cuts and gets beaten.
moves forward and defends on the track.
driven to cover.
pushes to the off side for a quick single.
works it in the gap through midwicket for a single.
cuts to short thirdman.
pushes to the off side for a quick single.
works it nicely through midwicket for couple of runs.
plays to short thirdman.
pushes it back down the track.
once again played back to the bowler.
good shot, driven down the ground wide of the long on fielder to the fence.
pushes to mid-on for a single.
plays to the onside for a single.
moves forward and drives down the ground to long off.
pushes in the gap through the off side.
quicker delivery defended to the off side.

another run out! Plays softly to the off side and takes off for a single, Shakib Al Hasan sends him back, Fawad Alam picks up the ball and throws it to Akmal, who gets rid of the bails as Ashraful dives back into the crease but not in time.
worked to fine leg.
works to short fine leg for a single.
pushes to the off side.
defended on the track.
worked to the onside.
pushes down the ground to long off.
tossed up delivery defended.
once again defended.
pushes to cover.
quicker delivery played back to the bowler.
swept away to long leg for couple of runs.
plays to the off side.
pushed to mid-on for a single.
plays to short thirdman for a single.
swept to deep-midwicket, good fielding Misbah, saves couple of runs.
driven down the ground to long off.
tossed up on the off stump, pushes to cover.
works it to fine leg for couple of runs.
worked to short fine leg for a single.
plays it to short thirdman.
driven down the ground to long off.
driven once again down the ground to long off.
pushed back to the bowler.
defended.
loud appeal for lbw turned down as it was sliding down the leg side.
pushed to cover.
cuts it down to thirdman for a single.
moves forward and defends down the track.
down the wicket and drives down the ground to long on.
worked to midwicket.
tossed up delivery, defended.
worked to the onside.
sweeps and gets an inside edge, almost drags it back onto the stumps.
turned to square leg.
pushed to cover.
tossed up outside the off stump, goes for the drive and misses.
pushes to mid-off for a single.
good length delivery defended to the off side.
left alone outside the off stump.
plays across the line and gets an inside edge onto the pads.
steers it down to thirdman for a single.
good sharp bouncer, ducks under it.
swept to fine leg for a single.
works it behind square leg for a single.
pushes through the off side to deep-point.
turns it away to long leg for a single.
pushed to cover.
defended to the off side.
pushes to mid-on.
dropped! Outside the off stump and Shakib Al Hasan drives, gets the outside edge to Akmal behind the wicket, who dives low to his right and drops the ball. That should have been taken.
good shot, full delivery on the legs, flicks it in the air to long leg fence.
drives to the sweeper cover for couple of runs.
plays down to thirdman for a single.
goes back and looks to defend, off the glove to the onside.
driven down the ground to long off.
forces it off the back foot down the ground to long off.
moves forward and drives down the ground to long off.
quicker delivery pushed to cover.
driven down the ground with the full face off the bat to long off.
off the pad to the onside.
worked to the onside to midwicket.
hurries up the batsman as he defends on the back foot.
pulls it around to fine leg for a single.
that was a quick short delivery from Sohail Khan, Mahmudullah takes his eye of the ball and gets a knock on the helmet.
pulls and gets beaten.
good delivery on target, defended.
driven to the sweeper cover.
pushes to the off side and takes off for a quick single, Fawad Alam moves across quickly and puts in a throw, misses the stumps and they go through for an overthrow.
pushes in the gap at cover for a single.
good shot, moves forward and drives in the air over extra cover to the fence.
driven through cover for a single.
worked to short fine leg for a single.
works to the onside and takes off for a quick single, Malik has a shy at the stumps at the non-strikers end, misses it.
short and wide outside the off stumps, cuts and gets an edge in the air down to thirdman for couple runs.
cuts it down wide of thirdman for couple of runs, brings up his 50 in 55 balls.
worked to midwicket for a single.
plays and misses outside the off stump.
bowled!  Fuller length delivery and Mahmudullah goes for a big shot on the onside, misses it completely and the middle stump is uprooted.
works it through midwicket for couple of runs.
good shot, goes inside-out over extra cover to the fence.
worked to short fine leg for a single.
pushes it back to the bowler.
plays to short thirdman.
drives it through midwicket for a single.
good length delivery on the off stump, defended to the off side.
pushed to mid-off.
pulls it just short of the midwicket fielder.
ducks under the bouncer.
pushes to point and takes off for a quick single.
driven to the sweeper cover for a single.
pushes to cover.
driven to cover.
off the pads to the onside, they scamper through for a leg bye.
pushes through cover for couple of runs.
driven well down the ground to the long on fence.
pushes in the gap on the off side for a single.
driven to deep-point, the fielder runs around to field it, they come back for the second run.
goes for the pull shot, off the glove the ball goes to gully.
good shot, punches it down the ground past mid-on to the fence.
pulls it to the onside.
full ball and Shakib Al Hasan sweeps it fine to fine leg fence.
cuts and misses outside the off stump.
stumped! Charges down the wicket and goes for the big shot, Afridi drags it short, Reza misses it and Akmal behind the wicket collects the ball and whips off the bails.
looks to go for the big shot and misses.
driven down the ground to long on for a single.
chips it in the air over short fine leg for couple of runs.
driven well down the ground to long off, good diving save by Butt.
bowled! Moves across his stumps and looks to play it over the keeper, misses it and the ball knocks back the stumps. Afridi picks up the second wicket in this over.
driven through cover for a single.
looking to drive in front of the wicket through the off side, gets the outside edge to thirdman fence.
digs in a short one which goes over Dhiman Ghosh, signaled a wide.
dropped! Short ball and Dhiman Ghosh pulls it high in the air down to fine leg, Afridi runs, dives and drops it.
driven well through extra cover to the fence, good shot.
pushes to the onside for  a single, shy at the stumps by Akmal misses the stumps, an overthrow, another poor throw comes in from long-off, they get another overthrow. A real comedy of errors.
full delivery outside the off stump, good shot through extra cover and the ball races to the fence.
driven in the gap to cover for a single.
slower delivery and Mortaza goes for a big shot and misses.
driven down the ground to long off for a single.
low full toss worked to midwicket for a single.
driven down the ground to wide long on for couple of runs.
slower delivery and Mortaza misses the big shot.
drives and misses outside the off stump.
driven to long off for a single, Tanvir oversteps.
yorker length delivery, plays and misses.
drives and misses outside the off stump.
driven down the ground to long off.
driven through midwicket to the deep for couple of runs.
slower delivery, goes for a big heave and misses it.
good shot, goes inside-out over extra cover to the fence.
pulls and gets beaten.
another short delivery and Mortaza once again misses the pull shot.
goes for a slog, off the pad goes behind the wicket.
slower delivery which goes wrong for Sohail, wide outside the off stump.
driven to extra cover, they scamper through for a quick single.
yorker length delivery dug out to the off side behind the wicket.
